database.name: VIEW GTS_STATUS_MOVEMENT_V
database.view: SELECT ad_ref_list.ad_ref_list_id AS gts_status_movement_v_id, ad_ref_list.ad_client_id, ad_ref_list.ad_org_id, ad_ref_list.updated, ad_ref_list.updatedby, ad_ref_list.isactive, ad_ref_list.created, ad_ref_list.createdby, ad_ref_list.value, ad_ref_list.name FROM ad_reference LEFT JOIN ad_ref_list ON ad_reference.ad_reference_id = ad_ref_list.ad_reference_id WHERE ad_reference.name = 'M_Transaction Movement Type'
